select year,book_name,author,book_pubyear,lend_times,id from library_report_ranking_author WHERE `year`= DATE_FORMAT('2015-01-01', '%Y') ORDER BY lend_times DESC limit 20

SELECT year ,hour ,sum(prints) as prints ,sum(ereads) as ereads from library_report_hour where `year`=2015 GROUP BY `hour`

SELECT year,book_kind,sum(m_book_lend_times+f_book_lend_times) as book_lend_times from zz_book_month_bookkinds_gender where `year`=2015 GROUP BY `book_kind` ORDER BY book_lend_times
select count(DISTINCT(account)) as lend from library_report_month_teacher
select `year` ,lend from library_report_month_mankinds where man_kind='教职工' GROUP BY `year`

SELECT DISTINCT(a.year), ifnull(b.lend,0) as lend from library_report_month_teacher a left JOIN (SELECT`year`,count(1) as lend from library_report_month_teacher WHERE lend > #{lend} and lend < #{back} GROUP BY `year`) b on a.year = b.year

SELECT a.book_kind,a.`year`,sum(a.book_lend_times) as book_lend_times FROM `zz_book_year_academy_bookkinds` a WHERE a.book_kind IN( SELECT book_kind FROM ( select *,SUM(book_lend_times) a FROM zz_book_year_academy_bookkinds GROUP BY book_kind ORDER BY a DESC limit 5 ) b ) GROUP BY a.`year`,a.book_kind ORDER BY a.`year`,a.book_kind
select `year` ,man_kind,sum(gctrl) as gctrl,SUM(lend) as lend,SUM(renew) as renew from library_report_month_mankinds GROUP BY `year`,man_kind
select `year` ,man_kind,sum(gctrl) as gctrl,SUM(lend) as lend,SUM(renew) as renew from library_report_month_mankinds where `year`=2016 GROUP BY man_kind
SELECT `year`,print_type,SUM(times) AS Print_times FROM `zz_print_day_printtype` GROUP BY `year`,print_type;

SELECT `year`,`month`,user_type,SUM(croom_times) AS croom_times,SUM(eread_times) AS eread_times,SUM(seat_times) AS seat_times,SUM(equipment_times) AS equipment_times FROM zz_ic_month_identity where year=2015 GROUP BY user_type,`year`,`month` ORDER BY user_type,`year`,`month`
SELECT stack,sum(amount) amount FROM library_report_bookcollection_count GROUP BY stack ORDER BY amount DESC limit 10
SELECT year ,stack,sum(amount) amount FROM library_report_bookcollection_year GROUP BY stack ORDER BY amount DESC limit 10

SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT category, bookType, sum(amount) amount FROM library_report_bookcollection_year where bookType like '%图书%' GROUP BY category, bookType ) a WHERE a.category in ( select b.category from( SELECT category, sum(amount) amount FROM library_report_bookcollection_year where bookType like '%图书%' GROUP BY category ORDER BY amount DESC limit 10 ) b )

SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT category, bookType, sum(amount) amount FROM library_report_bookcollection_year where bookType like '%外文%' GROUP BY category, bookType ) a WHERE a.category in ( select b.category from( SELECT category, sum(amount) amount FROM library_report_bookcollection_year where bookType like '%外文%' GROUP BY category ORDER BY amount DESC limit 10 ) b )
